benchmark_details.name: MM-Instruct
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces MM-Instruct, a large-scale dataset of diverse and high-quality visual instruction data designed to enhance the instruction-following capabilities of large multimodal models (LMMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a novel dataset and benchmark specifically designed to enhance and evaluate the instruction-following capabilities of LMMs.

data.source: Large-scale image captioning datasets and data generated through augmenting and summarization via ChatGPT.

methodology.calculation: Overall win rates were calculated for performance comparison by prompting GPT-4V to compare outputs from the model.
methodology.interpretation: Higher win rates indicate better instruction-following capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: LLaV A-Instruct demonstrated improved win rates compared to LLaV A-1.5 on various tasks.
methodology.validation: Manual checks for data quality were implemented on the generated instances.
